alert.note: Alert for Bullitt; Hardin; Larue; Shelby (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 7:26PM EDT until June 25 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM EDT FOR SPENCER...SOUTHWESTERN SHELBY...NELSON...SOUTHWESTERN ANDERSON... NORTH CENTRAL LARUE...NORTHWESTERN MARION...CENTRAL WASHINGTON...EAST CENTRAL HARDIN AND SOUTHEASTERN BULLITT COUNTIES... At 725 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bardstown, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Bardstown, Springfield, Taylorsville, Lebanon Junction, New Haven, Bloomfield, Loretto, Burkes Spring, Yoder and Dant. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central Kentucky. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
